sentences.hanzi: 我在北京工作了三年，现在想回家乡发展。
sentences.pinyin: Wǒ zài Běijīng gōngzuòle sān nián, xiànzài xiǎng huí jiāxiāng fāzhǎn.
sentences.english: I've worked in Beijing for three years, and now I want to go back to my hometown to develop my career.

sentences.hanzi: 这道菜有点儿咸，不过味道还不错。
sentences.pinyin: Zhè dào cài yǒu diǎnr xián, búguò wèidào hái búcuò.
sentences.english: This dish is a bit salty, but the flavor is still pretty good.

sentences.hanzi: 由于交通堵塞，我迟到了半个小时。
sentences.pinyin: Yóuyú jiāotōng dǔsè, wǒ chídàole bàn gè xiǎoshí.
sentences.english: Due to traffic congestion, I was half an hour late.

sentences.hanzi: 她不仅会说英语，还会说法语和德语。
sentences.pinyin: Tā bùjǐn huì shuō Yīngyǔ, hái huì shuō Fǎyǔ hé Déyǔ.
sentences.english: She not only speaks English, but also speaks French and German.

sentences.hanzi: 虽然今天下雨，但是我们的计划不会改变。
sentences.pinyin: Suīrán jīntiān xiàyǔ, dànshì wǒmen de jìhuà bù huì gǎibiàn.
sentences.english: Although it's raining today, our plans won't change.
